task1.title: Task #659: Implement Core Nemesis/Rival System Data Models and Relationships
task1.description: Design and implement the fundamental data models and relationship management functionality for the Nemesis/Rival System, including relationship types, grudge tracking, memory integration, and state progression mechanisms.

task2.title: Task #660: Implement Core Nemesis/Rival System Data Models and Relationships
task2.description: Design and implement the fundamental data models for the Nemesis/Rival System, including relationship extensions, profile models, triggering system, and persistence layer that integrates with the existing RelationshipManager.

task1.title: Task #643: Implement Comprehensive Data Structure for Global Arcs in the Arcs System
task1.description: Design and implement a robust data structure for Global Arcs that supports narrative progression, with properties for identity, purpose, stages, conditions, completion criteria, and system relationships while adhering to clean architecture principles.

task2.title: Task #647: Implement Comprehensive Data Structure for Faction Arcs in the Arcs System
task2.description: Design and implement a robust data structure for Faction Arcs that encapsulates faction-specific narrative journeys, including properties for faction identity, goals, progression stages, triggering conditions, inter-faction relationships, and completion criteria.

task1.title: Task #623: Conduct and Document Comprehensive Q&A Session for Motifs Narrative System
task1.description: Organize, conduct, and document a thorough Q&A session for the Motifs Narrative System, addressing motif tracking, player interaction, and system extensibility, resulting in clear and accessible documentation for both developers and narrative designers.

task2.title: Task #626: Conduct and Document Comprehensive Q&A Session for Nemesis/Rival System
task2.description: Organize, conduct, and document a thorough Q&A session for the Nemesis/Rival System covering nemesis generation, rivalry mechanics, player impact, and system extensibility, resulting in comprehensive documentation for developers and designers.

task1.title: Task #624: Conduct and Document Comprehensive Q&A Session for Arcs System
task1.description: Organize, conduct, and document a thorough Q&A session for the Arcs System covering all arc types (Global, Regional, Faction, Character), their generation, progression, dependencies, and integration with other narrative systems.

task2.title: Task #625: Conduct and Document Comprehensive Q&A Session for Rumors System
task2.description: Organize, conduct, and document a thorough Q&A session for the Rumors System covering rumor generation, propagation mechanics, player/NPC interaction, and integration with other game systems.
